description: This file contains smoke tests for authentication pages in a React application, testing rendering of login and register forms and toggle states.

methods.name: describe
methods.description: Defines a test suite for auth pages smoke tests.

methods.name: beforeEach
methods.description: Sets up local storage cleanup and fetch mock reset before each test.

methods.name: afterAll
methods.description: Restores mocked fetch after all tests.

methods.name: test
methods.description: Defines individual test cases for rendering and button state toggling.
